syo_model

Class DBTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • syo_model.DBTool

  • public class DBTool
extends java.util.Observable
    This class provides the basic functionality to setup and access the database. The Singleton pattern is used to prevent multiple instances.
    Author:
    ebrogt
